block.p: What's in a Name Most buyers of baseball gloves no longer look for a signature in the pocket unless they're children. Page 7.
A Voice That Echoes When It's Used Derek Jeter, the Yankee captain since 2003, defends his restrained reaction to the fans who are unrestrained about Alex Rodriguez. Page 2.
Around the Majors Murray Chass takes a look at what to expect in the divisions this season, with projected starting lineups. Pages 4-5.
